channel.title: Ssh on Imlauer
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on Imlauer

item.title: Ssh sin clave
item.description: sudo service sshd start sudo systemtcl start sshd sudo service sshd status ssh remote_username@remote_server_ip_address ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "your_email@gmail.com" ssh-copy-id remote_username@remote_server_ip_address Ahora podés ingresar a tu servidor sin contraseña: $ ssh remote_username@remote_server_ip_address `
